name: pyDoom (movement demo)
description:
So one day, I thought "I wonder if I can make a 3d looking game in pygame?" and after a couple of days, I had my first movement prototype, and I'm still working to make it bigger and better

CONTROLS: 

  • move forwards: w
  • move backwards: s
  • strafe left: a
  • strafe right: d
  • turn left: left arrow
  • turn right: right arrow
  • shoot: left click
  • pause: escape

also: check out my youtube, where I might post devlogs or updates or stuff of this project https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCX6RLkG-1fD5NLPW4oioPaA
